revised_title: Determination of the Atomic Weight of Glucinum (Beryllium)
tldr: The author discusses the methods used to determine the atomic weight of glucinum (beryllium) and its specific heat. They describe various methods of metal purification and the challenges faced in obtaining accurate results due to impurities and the difficulty in working with small quantities of the element. The author also compares different calorimeters and their limitations in determining specific heat.
